thread.title: Men reveal things they would do if it wasn’t considered ‘feminine’ (5 Photos)
thread.title_full: Men reveal things they would do if it wasn’t considered ‘feminine’ (5 Photos)

author: Travis
title: Men reveal things they would do if it wasn’t considered ‘feminine’ (5 Photos)
text:
VictorBlimpmuscle ____ 
Laser hair removal on my ass. Actually, I finally starting going (am in my 4th session) and omg it is amazing. I so should have just swallowed my pride and done this sooner. I have always had to shave between my butt cheeks because it was like shitting through a strainer if I didn’t. Also as a side effect, I save so much more on TP now rateds2k ____ 
Skirts. We need the ball room. I’m actually for the revival of cloaks and such as well. We should just wear robes. jaijaikali 5 
One night, my girlfriend decided to use one of those face mask things. So, I decided why the hell can’t I make my skin all nice and soft? Now I’m addicted and do them at least twice a week.
